ComicInfo.Title: A Dust of Crystals
ComicInfo.Summary: Shattered! The Autobots have withdrawn to the Crystal City and the Decepticons are at their gates! But with Optimus Prime and Bumblebee finally reunited, will this be the Autobots’ last stand or their greatest hour?! Don’t miss the other side of the epic story too, in Transformers: War’s End too!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 20:22:18. [CVDB907671]
ComicInfo.Colorist: David Garcia Cruz, Fran Gamboa, Thomas Deer
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Griffith, Ángel Hernández, Fran Gamboa, Nick Brokenshire, Thomas Deer
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Genre: Science Fiction, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV
ComicInfo.Characters: Alchemist Prime , Apeface, Arcee, Backstreet, Big Shot, Blitzwing, Bumblebee, Bumper, Chromia, Codexa, Deathsaurus, Elita-One, Gauge, Greenlight, Ironhide, Jumpstream, Kup, Lodestar, Lugnut, Megatron, Novastar, Obsidian, Onslaught, Optimus Prime, Pyra Magna , Ratchet, Sideswipe, Sidetrack, Sky Lynx, Snaptrap, Solomus, Solus Prime , Starscream, Stormcloud, Strika, Strongarm, Subsea, Sunrunner, Ultra Magnus, Vibes, Weirdwolf, Windblade
